sentences.en: A congressional report charges that federal safety laws were recklessly violated.
sentences.cn: 一份国会报告指责联邦安全法被公然违反。

sentences.en: A final source of congressional power is the spending clause.
sentences.cn: 国会权力的最后一条来源是经费条款.

sentences.en: Allende showed his disdain for the Congressional action.
sentences.cn: 阿连德根本不把国会的决议放在眼里.

sentences.en: As we have seen, congressional power in the environmental area is virtually unlimited.
sentences.cn: 如前所述,在环境方面, 国会的权力实际是无限的.

sentences.en: But the public and Congressional temper was decidedly different.
sentences.cn: 但是公众和国会的情绪是绝然不同的.

sentences.en: However, congressional opinion was generally helpful to us.
sentences.cn: 无论如何国会舆论总的来说是有助于我们的.

sentences.en: In the last half century, no congressional statute has failed this test.
sentences.cn: 近50年来, 所有的国会法令都经过了这一检验.

sentences.en: Le Duc Tho had gloated to me in May of the Congressional pressures on us.
sentences.cn: 五月份黎德寿就曾幸灾乐祸地对我大谈国会压力的问题.

sentences.en: Perhaps the most significant exercise of congressional authority is section 404 of the Clean Water Act.
sentences.cn: 也许国会权力最有意义的适用体现在《洁净水法案》的第404条.

sentences.en: Seventeen congressmen were absent at the Congressional roll call.
sentences.cn: 议会点名时有17名议员缺席.

sentences.en: The Cabinet was in attendance, as was the Congressional leadership from both sides of the aisle.
sentences.cn: 内阁成员都在场, 还有来自国会过道两侧的国会领袖们.

sentences.en: The Congressional Budget Office says the federal deficit shows every sign of getting larger.
sentences.cn: 国会预算办公室说有种种的迹象表明联邦赤字正在增加。

sentences.en: The president explained his plans to congressional leaders.
sentences.cn: 总统向国会领导人说明了他的计划。

sentences.en: The task force is comprised of congressional leaders, cabinet heads and administration officials.
sentences.cn: 工作小组由国会领导人、内阁首脑和行政官员组成。

sentences.en: There are two required stages for Congressional approval of agency funding.
sentences.cn: 国会批准行政机关的资金须经两个法定步骤.

sentences.en: Work of the CBO has helped improve congressional discipline.
sentences.cn: 国会预算办公室的工作有助于增进国会的效率.

words.tran_cn: 国会；代表大会；会议；社交
（美）国会女议员；众议院女议员

trans.tran_en: A congressional policy, action, or person relates to the U.S. Congress.
